mapper.insert: insert into posting ( posting_num, register_user_id, url, title, image_count, video_count, word_count, audit_at) values ( #{postingNum}, #{registerUserId}, #{url}, #{title}, #{imageCount}, #{videoCount}, #{wordCount}, now() ) on duplicate key update url = #{url}, title = #{title}, image_count = #{imageCount}, video_count =#{videoCount}, word_count =#{wordCount}, audit_at = now()
insert into request_history ( url, request_user_id, audit_at ) values( #{param1}, #{param2}, now() )on duplicate key update audit_at = now()
